set.name: dataProfiles
set.value: ranged weapons,ranged weapon,psychic weapon,melee weapons,melee weapon,weapons,magic weapons,maguc weapon,weapon,spell,load

div.style: margin-bottom: 52px;
padding: 24px 0px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(20, 21, 25) 0%, rgb(48, 57, 62) 45%, rgb(73, 74, 79) 100%); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); position: relative;
padding: 4px 16px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); position: relative; margin-left: 1.3rem;
position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 100%; display: flex;
background-color: var(--primary-color-transparent); height: 80px; min-width: 33%;
height: 80px; display: flex; flex-direction: column;
background-color: var(--primary-color-transparent); height: 40px;
flex: 10 1 0%; background-color: var(--primary-color-transparent); height: 40px;

font-family: ConduitITCStd; font-size: 2.5em; letter-spacing: 0.1px; line-height: 1; font-weight: 800; text-transform: uppercase; z-index: 1; position: relative; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 2px;
display: flex; flex-diration: column; gap: 6px; z-index: 1; position: relative;
display: flex; gap: 6px; z-index: 1; position: relative;
display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center;
font-size: 0.9em; font-weight: 800;
color: var(--primary-color); padding: 2px; background: var(--primary-color); clip-path: polygon(12% 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 20%, 100% 88%, 88% 100%, 20% 100%, 0px 100%, 0px 12%);

min-width: 3rem; min-height: 3rem; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background: rgb(232, 237, 231); clip-path: polygon(10% 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 20%, 100% 90%, 90% 100%, 20% 100%, 0px 100%, 0px 10%); padding: 3px; font-size: 1.6em; font-weight: 800;
display: flex; gap: 1.2rem;
margin-top: 16px; text-shadow: rgb(0, 0, 0) 0px 0px 5px; display: inline-block
font-size: 0.7em;
white-space: pre-wrap
display: flex; background-color: rgb(223, 224, 226);
width: 65%; border-right: 2px solid var(--primary-color); position: relative; padding-bottom: 40px; display: flex; flex-direction: column;
display: flex; width: 100%; justify-content: center;
display: flex; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0px 4px; line-height: 1.05;

span.style: font-size: 0.8em; font-weight: 700; color: var(--primary-color); text-transform: uppercase; line-height: 1.05;

td.style: text-align: left; font-size: 0.9em; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 1px; line-height: 1.4;
font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; text-align: left; padding-top: 4px; padding-bottom: 4px;

div.style: position: absolute; right: -2px; bottom: -16px; padding: 0px 42px 0px 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; background-color: rgb(188, 188, 190); border: 2px solid var(--primary-color); width: calc(100% - 0.9rem); background-size: contain; min-height: 54px; gap: 3px;

div.class: relative w-full flex-1 p-1 pb-50pxpt-5 print:p-20px sm:p-2 sm:pb-50px sm:pt-5 sm:print:p-20px sm:print:pb-50px md:p-20px md:pb-50px md:pt-5 md:print:p-20px md:print:pb-50px

div.style: font-size: 1.1em; padding: 1px 6px; background-color: var(--primary-color); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: 600; min-height: 27px; display: flex; align-items: center;
padding: 5px 2px; gap: 3px; border-bottom: 1px dotted rgb(158, 159, 161); line-height: 1.3; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap;
display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px; padding: 4px 2px; border-bottom: 1px dotted rgb(158, 159, 161);
font-size: 0.8em; line-height: 1.4;
margin-left: 4px;
margin-bottom: 50px

position: absolute; left: -28px; bottom: -16px; width: 54px; height: 54px; transform: rotate(-45deg); border: 2px solid var(--primary-color); overflow: hidden; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
background: center center rgb(188, 188, 190); min-height: 75px; min-width: 76px; transform: rotate(45deg);
